file_content.text: Dromund Kaas. I clung to this world for too long, before I cast it aside as a failed experiment.
You didn't cast it aside. I fought you and drove your spirit into hiding.
No, I defeated you.
I had already shifted my focus to Zakuul many centuries before your victory here.
This is the empty husk I left behind--but the Sith could still be a useful tool to help you seize the Eternal Throne.
Honored guests, welcome to Dromund Kaas.
Moff Lorman?
It's Minister Lorman now.
Really? Figured your career was over after you lost the Ascendant Spear.
Sounds like you know each other.
Friend of yours?
Lorman and I have a little history.
It's Minister Lorman! And the past is irrelevant. I serve Empress Acina now. She awaits us in the throne room.
Welcome, Commander. These are strange times.
Did you ever imagine the Sith would negotiate with a Jedi?
I hope you're able to move beyond your prejudice.
We are all more than we seem.
In the past, arrogance would have blinded us to our flaws. Now we understand admitting weakness is the first step in eliminating it.
I would like to continue this conversation on my personal shuttle. Just the two of us, speaking freely.
It may not be wise to split up.
I can handle myself if she tries anything. Will you two be okay if I leave you with Lorman?
Don't worry about me.
It's Minister Lorman! Minister Lorman! Is that so hard to remember?
Don't worry about us, Commander.
There remain Sith who do not approve of the alliance I offer. They hold tight to the old ways. But to stop Vaylin, we must work together.
I was strong enough to take Arcann down without your help.
I don't need assistance.
And then his sister took his place.
We both know there is only one path to victory. You want to seize the Eternal Throne. And I will help you.
Why me? You don't want the throne for yourself?
You don't want it?
I am focused on the survival of my people.
Unchecked, Vaylin will grind us into dust. I am not powerful enough to stop her. You are, with my help.
Engines non-responsive! We need to bring it down!
We're coming in too fast! Bail out!
And then you'll betray me and claim it for yourself.
So you can double cross me.
Ambition was the downfall of many great Sith. I will not let it be mine.
You hardly have a choice.
Is that all you want... or are you looking for a way to get closer to me?
[Flirt] Just work together?
Taking her down is all that matters. I welcome any help I can get.
You're right.
This does not end with Vaylin.
The commander of the Alliance is a tempting prospect... but this is purely a political offer.
I'm choosing to put my faith in her. Stay with Lorman and behave yourselves.
I trust Acina.
Be ready if anything happens--and keep an eye on Lorman.
Just stay alert.
Once, we would have been on the same side. Now, we negotiate as strangers.
I never imagined I would be negotiating with someone like you.
I only came to watch you beg for my help.
Time to kneel, Acina.
I see we're beginning with a round of compliments.
Not quite a friendly welcome.
You're speaking to the Empress of the Sith! You will address her with respect.
There is no point hiding our past, but the future depends on the correction of our flaws.
I didn't expect to be on Dromund Kaas again.
It's odd to be back.
I hope you prepared the same feast you give all your honored guests.
I expect a hero's welcome.
I can imagine. Much has changed for the better since you were last here.
I hardly think this is the time for jokes, Commander.
I urge you to not be so critical, Empress. The Sith Empire has always been glorious.
This story sounds too good to pass up.
This sounds interesting.
Of course, Acina sends a lackey to greet us.
Our welcome party is pathetic.
Lorman was a Sith lapdog when I met him too.
Back in my SIS days, I may have blown up a prototype Sith warship. Lorman was the deputy commander.
We weren't an experiment. We were your people... and you deserted us.
The Empire isn't some game.
Don't tell me you're getting sentimental.
A trip down memory lane?
The Sith are weak. You were right to leave them.
Good riddance.
The Empire was stronger without you.
We didn't need you.
You abandon everything you create.
Just like all your projects.
Not everything. Zakuul succeeded in ways Dromund Kaas never could.
Do not count yourself among them. You're beyond that.
I spent centuries here. You cannot imagine what I created.
They are flawed, but they have their merits.
Were you?
I want nothing to do with the throne.
That's not my path.
